titleStmt.title: A true account of the celebrated secret of Mr. Timothy Beaghan lately killed at the Five Bells tavern in the Strand, famous for curing the king's-evil : in a letter to Mr. William Cowper, surgeon / by Maurice Tobin ...
titleStmt.author: Tobin, Maurice.
Cowper, William, 1666-1709.
